p: Two exploratory factor analyses (EFAs) were performed to examine factor loadings of items in the SRPS by gender. Items with factor loadings <0.3 [ 26, 58] were removed and a modified scale was examined for reliability and validity. Gender-specific confirmatory factor analyses (CFAs) confirmed fit of modified models based on EFAs. Gender-specific Cronbach alphas were calculated for the total and modified versions of the SRPS included in AYAZAZI.
